24.content: Pressing Populate will create LED panel layout with pre-arranged matrix.

28.content: WARNING: You may need to update each panel parameters after they are generated.

32.content: A matrix is made of 1 or more physical LED panels.

33.content: Each panel can be of different size and/or have different LED orientation and/or starting point and/or layout.

39.content: file containing an array with number of elements equal to the matrix size.

40.content: A value of -1 means that pixel at that position is missing, a value of 0 means never paint that pixel, and 1 means regular pixel.
